title: [Life cycle of endamoeba histolytica]
brief_description: Microscopic appearance of cysts in various stages of development. Excystation - beginning of the ‘meta-cystic’ stage. Division of amoeba in ileum - ‘trophozoites’. Development of lesions caused by endamoeba histolytics. Illustration of an ulcerated colon.
